quote: Greater is He that in you than he that is in the world
speaker: Yeshua

quote: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere
speaker: Dr. Martin Luther King

quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
speaker: Maya Angelou

quote: If you want to look good in front of thousands you have to outwork thousands in front of nobody
speaker: Damion Lillard

quote: Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated.
speaker: Coretta Scott King

quote: Education is the passport for the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people of today
speaker: Malcolm X

quote: Wisdom does not come overnight.
speaker: African Proverb

quote: True humility is not thinking less of yourself but thinking of yourself less
speaker: C.S. Lewis

quote: If there is no struggle than there is no progress
speaker: Fredrick Douglas

quote: Eight hours of training is nothing compared to a second of losing
speaker: Kobe Bryant

quote: We have to talk about liberating minds as well as liberating society.
speaker: Angela Davis

quote: I took the road less traveled by and that has made all the difference
speaker: Robert Frost

quote: Good is the enemy of great
speaker: Jim Collins

quote: The only way for evil to prevail is for men and women to stop fighting it
speaker: Benjamin Franklin

quote: 80% of success is showing up
speaker: Woody Allen

quote: In the world you will have tribulation but be of good cheer because I have overcome the world
speaker: Yeshua

quote: Eye for eye makes the whole world blind
speaker: Ghandi

quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe then you will be successful
speaker: Eric Thomas

quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity but if you want to test a man's character give him power
speaker: Abraham Lincoln

quote: A little impatience will spoil great plans.
speaker: Chinese Proverb

quote: Pressure creates diamonds
speaker: George S Patton Jr

quote: Knowledge is a garden. If it isn’t cultivated, you can’t harvest it
speaker: African Proverb

quote: If you stay ready you never have to get ready
speaker: Andy Mineo

quote: History will be kind to me because I intend to write it
speaker: Winston Churchill

quote: If you are going through hell, keep going
speaker: Winstong Churchill

quote: Everyone has the power for greatness not for fame but greatness because greatness is determined by service
speaker: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Even the lion protects himself against flies.
speaker: African Proverb

quote: There will alwyas be a person to do things the easy way but you must learn how to do things the write way
speaker: Chu-Hui

quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be
speaker: Laozi

quote: In a country of blind men one eyed man is king
speaker: Nigerian Proverb

quote: We must have faith and pray as though it all on God but we must work as though it was all on us
speaker: Ellen White

quote: Sick and tired of being sick and tired
speaker: Fanny Lou Hamer

quote: Truth should be in love and love in truth.
speaker: African Proverb

quote: By any means necessary
speaker: Malcolm X

quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in the moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands in times of challenge and controversy
speaker: Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: I prefer peace but if trouble must come let it come in my time so my children could live in peace
speaker: Thomas Paine

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out
speaker: Robert Collier

quote: Family must look out for family
speaker: African Proverb

quote: To be number one you have to be odd
speaker: Dr.Seuss

quote: Never make someone a priority when all you are to them is an option.
speaker: Maya Angelou

quote: Whatever you want to do, if you want to be great at it, you have to love it and be able to make sacrifices for it.
speaker: Maya Angelou

quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still
speaker: Chinese Proverb

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
speaker: Alice Walker

quote: Never work just for money or for power. They won’t save your soul or help you sleep at night.
speaker: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
speaker: Chinese Proverb

quote: For every matter there is an appointed time, even a time for every pursuit under the heavens
speaker: Proverbs 3: 1

quote: There is no elevator you have to take the stairs
speaker: Zig Ziglar

quote: Money and success don’t change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
speaker: Will Smith

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people’s thinking.
speaker: Steve Jobs

quote: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
speaker: Seneca

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
speaker: Socrates

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
speaker: Albert Einstein

quote: “Watch your thoughts; they become words. Watch your words; they become actions. Watch your actions; they become habits. Watch your habits; they become character. Watch your character; it becomes your destiny.”
speaker: Lao-Tze

quote: The healthiest response to life is joy
speaker: Deepak Chopra

quote: Keep calm and carry on.
speaker: Winston Churchill

quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed
speaker: Michael Jordan

quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
speaker: Mark Twain

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
speaker: Les Brown

quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
speaker: Confucius

quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome while trying to succeed.
speaker: Booker T. Washington

quote: Never be limited by other people’s limited imaginations.
speaker: Dr. Mae Jemison

quote: You can’t separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.
speaker: Malcolm X

quote: The soul that is within me no man can degrade.
speaker: Frederick Douglass

quote: True peace is not merely the absence of tension; it is the presence of justice.
speaker: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Your willingness to look at your darkness is what empowers you to change.
speaker: Iyanla Vanzant

quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one’s chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
speaker: Nelson Mandela

quote: At the end of the day, it’s not about what you have or even what you’ve accomplished. It’s about what you’ve done with those accomplishments. It’s about who you’ve lifted up, who you’ve made better. It’s about what you’ve given back.”
speaker: Denzel Washington

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
speaker: Alice Walker

quote: Truth is powerful and it prevails.
speaker: Sojourner Truth

quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
speaker: Paulo Coelho

quote: The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life
speaker: Confucius

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
speaker: Socrates

quote: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
speaker: Sun Tzu

quote: Never mistake knowledge for wisdom. One helps you make a living; the other helps you make a life.
speaker: Sandra Carey

quote: While we may not be able to control all that happens to us, we can control what happens inside us.
speaker: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Take the first step in faith. You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
speaker: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: There is no innovation and creativity without failure. Period.
speaker: Brene Brown

quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
speaker: Napoleon Hill

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, ‘Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion
speaker: Muhammad Ali

quote: The more we learn, the more we discover how much we do not know.
speaker: Yoda

quote: Nobody can make you feel inferior without your permission.
speaker: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: You’ve heard that it’s wise to learn from experience, but it is wiser to learn from the experience of others.
speaker: Rick Warren

quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all
speaker: Aristotle

quote: Don’t waste your time with explanations, people only hear what they want to hear.
speaker: Paulo Coelho
